name: portal
title: Portal
description: Portal Component A component that renders its children into a different part of the DOM tree. Useful for modals, tooltips, and dropdowns that need to render outside their parent container to avoid overflow or z-index issues. Uses @barefootjs/dom's createPortal utility for client-side portal mounting.
